47: The purpose of the Conditional Search ROM command in the DS28E04-100 module is to allow the bus master to identify devices on a multidrop system that have to signal an important event. This command operates similarly to the Search ROM command, but only devices that fulfill certain conditions (CSR = 1) will participate in the search. After each pass of the conditional search that successfully determines the 64-bit ROM code for a specific device on the multidrop bus, that particular device can be individually accessed as if a Match ROM had been issued. This allows the bus master to access and communicate with specific devices on the bus while all other devices have dropped out of the search process and are waiting for a reset pulse.
